channel.title: 4 minutes help (L)
channel.description:
everytime im doing my summoning special attack , i've to wait 4 minutes after that hit..
how to remove this?
im using insidia (L)

item.title: 4 minutes help (L)
item.dc:creator: @Dario14 Dario14
item.description:
@Dario14 wrote:

Go into your server files and type in the message you receive upon trying to use the special which in this case you said something about waiting 4 minutes, search that and go into that file and Ctrl+F and type in some of that message there should a timer, remove it or null it out by putting // right before it and infront of the message which says that you have to wait 4 minutes

Read full topic
